snippet: Gov. Rick Perry of Texas told a gathering of scouts in Austin that they should continue to embrace traditional conservative values.
abstract: Texas Gov Rick Perry, speaking at gathering of Boy Scouts of America, says organization should not soften its strict policy barring gay members; dismisses idea of bending it to whims of 'popular culture.'
lead_paragraph: Gov. Rick Perry of Texas told a gathering of scouts in Austin that they should continue to embrace traditional conservative values.

headline.seo: Rick Perry Opposes Opening Boy Scouts to Gays
headline.main: Perry Fights Letting Gays in Boy Scouts
headline.print_headline: Perry Fights Letting Gays In Boy Scouts
